isis.stitle: AIR CONDITIONING - HEATER SYSTEM: 5000, 9000 Series Without Lowered heater Box - REMOVE AND INSTALL - CONTROL CABLE REPLACEMENT

step1.para: Remove the screws from the control panel assembly bezel on the instrument panel ( Figure 16). Pull control assembly away from the instrument panel.
Locate the cable to be removed and remove the clip securing the cable eyelet to the control lever pin ( Figure 16). Cables can be identified by the color-coded mounting flags.

note.para: PULL-RECIRC Cable is mounted on the instrument panel separate from the A/C-Heater control.

step1.para: Remove control cable mounting screw and disconnect the cable from the control lever.
Disconnect the opposite end of the cable as follows:

step3.para: Remove the control cable mounting screw from the mounting bracket.
Remove the retainer clip and disconnect the cable from the defrost door crank.
Remove the passenger seat and the Blend-Air unit cover.
Remove the cable mounting screw from the thermostatic control switch bracket.
Remove the thermostatic control switch from the mounting bracket.
Remove the retainer clip and disconnect the cable from the switch lever.
Remove the passenger seat and the Blend-Air unit cover.
Remove the control cable mounting screw from the cable mounting bracket.
Disconnect the cable from the Blend-Air door.
Withdraw the end of the cable through the hole at the front of the Blend-Air unit housing.

step1.para: Note cable routing and withdraw cable as required.

note.para: When installing new control cables, follow the color code outlined in the Remove procedure above.

step1.para: Position the cable as it was originally routed.
At the instrument panel end of the cable, hold the cable sleeve, then push and pull the inner cable to verify that it moves freely. If not, look for kinks and bends, and correct the condition.
At the control assembly, connect the cable eyelet to the control lever pin and install the retainer clip.
Attach the cable sleeve (flag) to the control assembly.
Connect the opposite end of the cable as outlined below.

step3.para: Inside the Blend-Air housing unit, connect the cable to the thermostatic switch lever and install the retainer clip.
Install the switch on its mounting bracket.
Fasten the cable mounting flag (red) to the switch bracket.
Inside the Blend-Air housing unit, connect the cable to the Blend-Air door.
Fasten the cable mounting flag (white) to the cable mounting bracket.
Connect the cable to the defrost door crank mounting bracket.
Fasten the cable mounting flag (black) to the mounting bracket.

step1.para: Adjust the control cable(s) as outlined in CONTROL CABLE ADJUSTMENT.
Position the control assembly in the instrument panel and install the mounting screws ( Figure 16).
If necessary, install the Blend-Air unit cover and the passenger seat.
